casebody.data:
Craig NABER, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
Jerald "Jerry" NABER, Defendant-Appellant. No. 18-0574 Court of Appeals of Iowa. Filed April 17, 2019

DECISION WITHOUT PUBLISHED OPINION

See Iowa R. App. P. 6.904

Jerald Naber appeals the district court's denial of his motion for new trial in this negligence action. Craig Naber cross-appeals, seeking interest on the jury award to begin on the date of the negligent conduct. AFFIRMED ON APPEAL; AFFIRMED AS MODIFIED ON CROSS-APPEAL.

AFFIRMED ON APPEAL. AFFIRMED AS MODIFIED ON CROSS-APPEAL.
